extends.description: A list of packages to extend the configuration from. Can be a path to a local file or a package name.

globalDependencies.description: A list of file glob patterns that Turborepo will use to determine if a task should be executed.

globalEnv.description: A list of environment variables that are used by all tasks. These variables are passed to the tasks as environment variables.

pipeline.description: The pipeline configuration for the Turborepo.

cache.description: Whether or not to cache the task.

dependsOn.description: A list of tasks that this task depends on.

outputs.description: A list of file glob patterns that are the outputs of the task.

env.description: A list of environment variables that are used by the task.

outputMode.description: The output mode of the task.

persistent.description: Whether or not the task is a persistent task.
